Detailed Description

An interface to any file system or other provider of named data streams

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Virtual destructor.

Member Function Documentation

virtual FileInfoListPtr Mangle::VFS::VFS::find ( const std::string &  pattern,
bool  recursive = true,
bool  dirs = false 
) const [pure virtual]

Find files after a given pattern. Wildcards (*) are supported. Only valid if 'hasFind' is true. Don't implement your own pattern matching here if the backend doesn't support it natively; use a filter instead.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.

virtual bool Mangle::VFS::VFS::isDir ( const std::string &  name  )  const [pure virtual]

Check for the existence of a directory.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.

virtual bool Mangle::VFS::VFS::isFile ( const std::string &  name  )  const [pure virtual]

Check for the existence of a file.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.

virtual FileInfoListPtr Mangle::VFS::VFS::list ( const std::string &  dir = "",
bool  recurse = true,
bool  dirs = false 
) const [pure virtual]

List all entries in a given directory. A blank dir should be interpreted as a the root/current directory of the archive. If dirs is true, list directories instead of files.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.

virtual Stream::StreamPtr Mangle::VFS::VFS::open ( const std::string &  name  )  [pure virtual]

Open a new data stream. Deleting the object (letting all the pointers to it go out of scope) should be enough to close it.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.

virtual FileInfoPtr Mangle::VFS::VFS::stat ( const std::string &  name  )  const [pure virtual]

Get info about a single file.

Implemented in Mangle::VFS::OgreVFS, Mangle::VFS::PhysVFS, and DummyVFS.
